column1:
rich_text_section">Good afternoon JobHunters!  Here's another interesting one, if you like the idea of DevOps: https://www.civilservicejobs.service.gov.uk/csr/index.cgi?'ll notice that they ask for 1+ years of experience in designing, building and managing AWS environments.I dropped them a line to ask if they would consider someone without that experience and they said:"Applications are assessed based on your personal statement responding to the essential criteria. If you feel you meet some, or all of these, please feel free to apply."I guess I gave the wrong impression but, in any case, it looks like they will consider people without that year of AWS experience.
civilservicejobs.service.gov.uk
Junior DevOps Engineer - Civil Service Jobs - GOV.UK
Search and apply for opportunities within the Civil Service. (112 kB)
https://static.civilservicejobs.service.gov.uk/csr/assets/images/opengraph-image.png?0.12.0
Will Bentinck. Makers Careers (he/him)  10:08 AM
Really interesting article to help you with your CVsI especially like the "approach vs technologies" section
